text: Mehdi Hanifa oglu Huseynzade (December 22, 1918, Novxanı, Azerbaijan – November 2, 1944, Vitovlje, Slovenia) was an Azerbaijani guerrilla and scout during World War II. After he died he was given the title of Hero of the Soviet Union on April 11, 1957. Huseynzade attended the Azerbaijan University of Languages.Гусейн-заде Мехти Ганифа оглы - Герой Советского Союза His life and heroism during World War II was described in Imran Gasimov's book On Distant Shores. ==References== Category:Azerbaijani military people Category:Azerbaijani communists Category:1918 births Category:1944 deaths Category:Recipients of the Order of Lenin Category:20th-century Azerbaijani people
title: Mehdi Huseynzade
